name: Escape is not Easy
description:
You wake up in a some sort of house and theres a door infront of you and you need to escape from it

Tools used:

Engine: Unreal Engine 4 Models: Blender
Sounds: Audacity
Textures edited in: PaintDotNet

Credits:

Sounds by Freesounds

Controls:

WASD: Move
Mouse: Look
LMB: Interact with objects
F: Flashlight

Info:

Is just a prototype game
